name: Connected
description:
The Free Democratic Union has taken over. Your country is slowly losing all means of communicating, both with the outside world and among yourselves.

It's been 5 days and your sister is still missing. Is she involved in the Resistance movement? You receive a message from a stranger, claiming to know what's going on...

Connected is a game about communicating when your government doesn't want to. Enjoy!

[Still sort of a work in progress]
